CV.PRODWARE: Functional and Technical Consultant in systems Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM with Support Unified Service Desk.
CV.MACSA: Incident management in Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM, generally of a functional type on the application and very occasionally small developments to add scripts with new functionalities in the application.
CV.OPENBANK:
Incident management and monitoring, providing active support in various face-to-face locations such as the central offices or the main call center. Collaboration with other providers such as BT or Accenture for the business call integration environment through Unified Service Desk allowing to operate in the CRM application and that of the bank for the operations requested by the client.

In addition to actively supporting users who requested help at the time (follow-up meetings or phone calls), I was mainly in charge of reviewing the application's activity and its logs to find the reasons why an operation could not be carried out by the telephone assistants.
CV.SOPRA: Junior developer specialized in web applications, maintenance, including new functionalities, deployment and management of database integrity.
CV.AIRBUS:
myWorkload+: Internal web application for workload management. The planned hours for each department during the fiscal year are recorded and translated into allocated budgets.

Proposals for offers to various customers are also recorded, keeping track of the point at which the offer is (draft, proposal to customer, approved by customer, etc.) and its variations in tasks to be carried out and prices.

Users also have a parallel processing system in which they can send their Excel files with the different operations of the graphical interface through the web for massive data processing.

The application is built on .NET Framework Standard 4.5 MVC and deployed on multiple instances on Windows Server for different departments by changing the appropriate settings.
CV.SAS:
AviSAS: User notification system in a microservices environment where events are received from medical systems and processed according to the configuration of each user for the sending of notifications notifying about the health appointments they have pending.

A web management application is included in Node.js and Angular for the monitoring of received and processed events, allowing the web administrator to configure the notification rules based on certain criteria (e.g.: if a hospitalization event is received from a minor, send notification to their parents).

The database is managed in PL/SQL, with a daily load of ~600,000 messages received and ~5,000 notifications sent to users.

The entire application is sent and managed to the SAS IT team, which manages the Docker containers of the microservices that make up the solution using the deployment steps indicated by our team in a HELM. Instances were deployed in Jenkins and code went through SonarQube

COLLECTIONS.TITLE: Collections
COLLECTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Here you will find several groups of drawings united by a common theme

PRINT.ALERT: This page is optimized for printing. Press Ctrl + P to print.

PROJECTS.ROMERART: Web page in Azure to display the drawings I upload to social media.
PROJECTS.SHARETHETRACK: Flutter app for Android that doubles as a social network for sharing Spotify music.
PROJECTS.FORMULAGP: Application in Xamarin to view data and statistics about Formula 1 races by consuming an API from third parties.
PROJECTS.SECRETMANAGER: Kotlin app for Android to encrypt and decrypt text strings.
PROJECTS.FACTORYCHAOS: Mini-game in Unity (C#) to learn about the framework.
PROJECTS.F1TELEMETRY: Java application to track the races my brothers and I played in the F1 2018 video game.

CAREFULL.TITLE: Prudent
CAREFULL.DESCRIPTION: "Careful, it perceives numerous risks that exist, identifies and evaluates them to minimize them."

ANALYTIC.TITLE: Analytic
ANALYTIC.DESCRIPTION: "He likes data because it represents objective information. With them, you look for models and connections, you want to understand how certain patterns or models interact. Some consider it logical and rigorous."

RESTORER.TITLE: Restorer
RESTORER.DESCRIPTION: "He loves solving problems. He is excited by the challenge of analyzing the symptoms, identifying what is wrong, and finding the solution. Enjoy making things come back to life."

EQUITY.TITLE: Equity
EQUITY.DESCRIPTION: "He is fully aware of the need to treat everyone equally. He believes that people perform better in a consistent environment, where the rules are clear and apply to everyone equally."

RELATION.TITLE: Relation
RELATION.DESCRIPTION: "He is attracted to people he already knows. Once the initial contact is established, he deliberately tries to deepen that relationship. The more they share with each other, the more they take risks together."

PERSONAL.TITLE: Know Me
PERSONAL.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see a brief description of who I am, various tastes and reference artists

HIRE.TITLE: Hire Me
HIRE.DESCRIPTION: Summary with my resume updated to the latest version of the application

DESCRIPTION.TITLE: About Me
DESCRIPTION.1: Hi, I'm Miguel, a shy guy whose main hobby is playing a good video game (from Horizon to Crash Bandicoot, TLOU, GoW, Hollow Knight, and many others).
DESCRIPTION.2: When I'm not playing, I try to draw, from my favorite characters in games to actors whose performances make me feel alive. I draw any character that makes me feel good, that excites me, that I could respect, or for their captivating beauty.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Change the app's behaviour and style and custom your experience.

CHANGE-LANGUAGE.TITLE: Change Language
CHANGE-LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Change the app's language. Some content of the app (such as drawings) will not be translated.

TRANSLATIONS.TITLE: Translate content
TRANSLATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Shows a button to translate drawing's title and comments.

THEME.TITLE: Change Theme
THEME.DESCRIPTION: Change the app's color palette, so there are lighter or darker colors.

AUTH.TITLE: Sign In
AUTH.DESCRIPTION: Log in as an administrator and edit the content of the site.

SHOW-FILTER-COUNT.TITLE: Count Results
SHOW-FILTER-COUNT.DESCRIPTION: Count the amount of options availables in a filter in the filter drawings form

IMAGE-ZOOM.TITLE: Enable Zoom on images
IMAGE-ZOOM.DESCRIPTION: Enable zooming in on images by hovering over or mirroring the image with two fingers

FORMAT-DATE.TITLE: Date Format
FORMAT-DATE.DESCRIPTION: Change the way dates are displayed throughout the app.

SHOW-SPOTIFY.TITLE: Spotify
SHOW-SPOTIFY.DESCRIPTION: Show Spotify links in those drawings which have a Spotify track linked.

SHOW-KUDOS.TITLE: Kudos
SHOW-KUDOS.DESCRIPTION: Show how many kudos (or likes) a drawing has.

DRAWING-SEARCH.TITLE: Gallery
DRAWING-SEARCH.SUBTITLE: Here there are a few of my public drawings and illustrations. Touch any of them to see details

DRAWING-DETAILS.NOSPOTIFY: There's no Spotify track related to this drawing.
